content: It seems folks are still talking on rfc#2753. I plan to close the RFCs and I drafted a quick comment explaining the plan.
before posting though I will probably remove the existing rfc text and maybe merge PR #8
hmm there's a lot in that PR :)
You still have an unfinished sentence at the end of that...do you have any objection to me closing the PR, with a less-detailed comment?
If not, I think it would be perfectly reasonable to post what you have minus the incomplete sentence
Excellent! Was about to close 2699 until I saw you had done so :D
I see a ton of comments in the meeting time thread and elsewhere :) heh, will try to catch up later
Hm, let's try something - wait until I've written up a summary or two, and see if you still feel the need to review the original Zulip conversations to "catch up", or if that's sufficient
That is, after all, part of our goal with the new approach, I think!
I guess I consider it the responsibility of at least one shepherd (currently me, since Adam is busy) to stay on top of all discussion
and I want the summaries to be good enough that no one else "needs" to read _everything_
You've been more or less filling that role, which is awesome (thank you!), but I realize you are quite busy!

Hm, let's try something - wait until I've written up a summary or two, and see if you still feel the need to review the original Zulip conversations to "catch up", or if that's sufficient

good idea :)
